they Dilip who-dat blood do-fut quot know-inf come-past

tier.item: ii) mee kawru hari narckc kenek api atcrc pilisindila tiyencwa. eekc nisaa tamay
this who etc bad person us among conceive-prt exist that-one because indeed
ia) 'Some bad person or other has been conceived among us. That's the reason we have all this
ib) NOT' We have all this trouble because of some bad persion who has been conceived among
